description: This PHP source file provides a web interface for editing a managed service to be blocked in a parental control system. It includes server-side logic to fetch and display current service settings, as well as client-side JavaScript for form validation and interactions, with form submission handled via AJAX.

methods.name: scheduleValidation
methods.description: Adds validation rules to the form, including custom methods for port ranges and time validation.

methods.name: updateBlockTimeVisibility
methods.description: Enables or disables time input fields based on whether the service is set to always be blocked.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes form fields with existing service data and sets up event handlers for user interactions.
